name: Hidden
description:
The game takes place in a big mansion divided in 4 biomes. Each biome has a different structure and has different traps to overcome, in order to continue the game.

HIDE EVERYWHERE IN THE ROLE OF A "HIDDEN":
Switch on the Reactors and press the buttons scattered all over the map.
Vanish from the Hunters with the help of the teleports.
Everything can be a hiding place, a wardrobe or a fountain or a barrel.
Each "Hidden" has a unique ability, so create your startegy to avoid the Hunters.

HUNT IN THE ROLE OF A HUNTER:
Seek and destroy all the "Hiddens".
Nothing can stop you. Do they hide? Demolish their hiding places.
They can run but they cannot escape.

PLAY ALONE...
Train in the single player mode by facing BOTS in matches with a different game logic than the multiplayer one.

...OR WITH OTHER PLAYERS
Choose your side in online matches from 2 to 10 players and play with friends by entering the same room.
Face them in the classic game mode, hide, hunt and team up to reach the victory.
